EmailTemplate.description: Email template used to send IST Account Managers reminders about a dealers docs going out to compliance soon.
EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Doc Two Week Expiration Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Dealer Doc Expiring Soon for Account {!Dealer_Docs__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
One of your Accounts ({!Dealer_Docs__c.Account__c}) has a document that is about to expire on {!Dealer_Docs__c.Expiration_Date__c}. Please reach out to remind them to provide a current document. The type of document expiring is a: {!Dealer_Docs__c.RecordType}. The link to the expiring document is unavailable outside of HTML formatting.
Thank You!
